content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command from the user to check the accuracy and up-to-dateness of data on https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/meme/historical_data. My computer successfully downloaded meme_data.csv from the website. Recently, my computer received a command to read the file, which returned a redirection message. I then executed the command to check the shell, which returned a message about the download progress. My computer received a command to delete the meme_data.csv file. However, the command returned an error message stating that the file has already been deleted. The user then issued a command to execute the shell, which successfully downloaded the csv file again. The user issued another command to delete the file, which again returned an error message stating that the file has already been deleted. As me, the latest development was receiving a command to read the file, which returned a redirection message.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "curl -o meme_data.csv https://www.coingecko.com/price_charts/export/68078.csv"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb''\nSTDERR:\nb'  % Total    % Received % Xferd  Average Speed   Time    Time     Time  Current\\n                                 Dload  Upload   Total   Spent    Left  Speed\\n\\r  0     0    0     0    0     0      0      0 --:--:-- --:--:-- --:--:--     0\\r100   583    0   583    0     0   3886      0 --:--:-- --:--:-- --:--:--  3886\\n'"}]
"""
